Reviews.Title: GREED got to me.
Reviews.Author: A. Tay "Private Tay"
Reviews.Content: Like the 24x zoom, so got itBad:No manual controlGood:Cheaper than the SZ16 and SZ31 - both also 24x zoom camerasBiggest quibble:The spot-metering doesn't seem as spot-on as the Nikon P310I know the p310 has a much shorter zoom rangeBut even when I spot-metered across the same lens range, the pictures do not have the kind of highlight/contrast I get with the p310Also, the p310 has a small circle which you can point at the spots you want to meterThe Sz14 doesn'tThe sz4 shares the same battery/charger as the Pentax waterproofI got this camera because I want to shoot some sunbirds and kingfishersI have a Lumix FZ200 with a 24-600mm f2.8 lensEven though the FZ200 isn't a big camera, it's harder to tote around everywhere than the SZ14Not many 24x zoom compactsI hear conflicting views about the Fuji but the shops won't let me field-test themConclusion:If you don't push the camera - don't go for night shots without flash, don't go for nervous birds in flight, you'll do okThe spot-metering results are not consistent, so what I do is set to high and get as many frames as I can and hope one turns out ok.
